block.name: WX GUI Static Text
block.doc:
TODO This block creates a variable with a static text form. \ Leave the label blank to use the variable id as the label.
Format should be a function/lambda that converts a value into a string or None for the default formatter.
Use the Grid Position (row, column, row span, column span) to position the graphical element in the window.
Use the Notebook Param (notebook-id, page-index) to place the graphical element inside of a notebook page.
